name: Damm! Double Trouble
description:
Web version is available, but it has interface scaling issues.
Windows version has no scaling issues.

Run away from the horde of clones of yourself that are trying to kill you! They aren´t very smart but keep in mind that everything you have they also have.

This game was made for the  GBJAM9 about Original Gameboy

Controls:

A -> Left Click - Shoot/Punch

B -> Right Click - Pick Up Item

D-Pad -> WASD/Arrows - Movement

Select - Space Bar

Start - Enter
